Movies.title: jambada Hudugi
Movies.description: A girl who is a doctor falls in love with a boy. When the boy spurns her love,she tries to impress him at all costs.

Movies.title: Moggina Manasu
Movies.description: Renu, Akka, Didi and Chanchala are four friends from college who face several adversities in life. However, they find one way or another to live their life to the fullest.

Movies.title: Rocky
Movies.description: Rocky is head over heels in love with Usha. On realising that she is in love with Vishwas, he sacrifices his love and tries to unite her with her lover.

Movies.title: Kallara Sante
Movies.description: A young man who is let down by the system decides to commit suicide. When the news spreads to the media and the government, he undergoes a life-changing event.

Movies.title: Gokula
Movies.description: Four young orphans pretend to be the grandchildren of a wealthy old man to inherit his wealth. But things take an emotional turn and the orphans start contemplating their evil plan.

Movies.title: Thamassu
Movies.description: An honest police officer wages a war against terrorists in the city and begins to kill them. However, he starts to question his methods when he kills an alleged terrorist.
